attributes.action: Review and limit the profit made by companies appointed as recievers during the current economic period
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would seem obscene to me that large profits are being made out of the msifortunes of others in particular the seemingly un contested way in which the same companies are repeatedly being quoted as "handling the administration" of those who have been placed into liquidation. Some of these profits could offset the very debts behind the closures themselves.
